ThingDef.label: Retro Rifle
ThingDef.description: Nostalgia is a hell of a thing. People appreciate a classic or at least the idea of a classic, so many companies put our various “retro” themed weaponry. The “Retro” Weapon market leads to many interesting designs that feel old but are in fact very new. This model being built of a famous weapon used centuries ago during humanity’s Dark Age. Though not a direct copy this imitation still sells well enough and maintains enough aspects of the original that many don’t notice the difference. Often found in the hands of the middle-class mercenary or with people who assumed this would be more useful than a classic car on the Rim.\n\n Millenia Model 0 "The Classica."

li.LoreDesc: Nostalgia is a hell of a thing. People appreciate a classic or at least the idea of a classic, so many companies put our various “retro” themed weaponry. The “Retro” Weapon market leads to many interesting designs that feel old but are in fact very new. This model being built of a famous weapon used centuries ago during humanity’s Dark Age. Though not a direct copy this imitation still sells well enough and maintains enough aspects of the original that many don’t notice the difference. Often found in the hands of the middle-class mercenary or with people who assumed this would be more useful than a classic car on the Rim.\n\n Millenia Model 0 "The Classica."
li.VanillaDesc: A modern rifle styled after ancient designs. Fires quick bursts with modest accuracy and damage. Favored on the Rim by mercenaries and militias for its reliability.

ThingDef.label: Heavy "Autoloader" Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Last of the ill-fated “Autoloader” series of rifles, designed in the furnaces of Warworlds during the Inter-Humanity Wars. A 16.5MM Light Cannon was seen as the pinnacle of the Assault Rifle genus, it easily penetrated Human made armor and even capable of disabling light vehicles and aircraft. The massive flaw of this weapon though was weight, light cannons are in fact not light, and these weapons often used less and were eventually outclassed.\n\nOfficial Name: Alexandria Armaments Type-22 "Double Deuce."

li.LoreDesc: The Last of the ill-fated “Autoloader” series of rifles, designed in the furnaces of Warworlds during the Inter-Humanity Wars. A 16.5MM Light Cannon was seen as the pinnacle of the Assault Rifle genus, it easily penetrated Human made armor and even capable of disabling light vehicles and aircraft. The massive flaw of this weapon though was weight, light cannons are in fact not light, and these weapons often used less and were eventually outclassed.\n\nOfficial Name: Alexandria Armaments Type-22 "Double Deuce."
li.VanillaDesc: A massive rifle chambered in 16.5mm, more like a light cannon than a gun. Very heavy but able to pierce armor and even disable light vehicles. Deadly if you can handle the weight.

ThingDef.label: Hyperblaster
ThingDef.description: A relatively new weapon in comparison to many of its compatriots on the Rim. The Hyperblaster was one of the first charge weapons created during the Human-Mechanoid Wars and it shows. Heavy, clumsy, but packs more wallop than modern Charge weapons due to its very unrefined abilities. These traits are the reason it is called the Hyperblaster rather than its official name or even the other names given to it like Siegebreaker and Quakemaker. Though being replaced by more convenient Charge weapons, the weapon is still in production and will likely continue to do so, because it works, and it works well especially when you have power armored soldiers who can easily carry it.\n\nOfficial Name: Camlann Varangian V.II.

li.LoreDesc: A relatively new weapon in comparison to many of its compatriots on the Rim. The Hyperblaster was one of the first charge weapons created during the Human-Mechanoid Wars and it shows. Heavy, clumsy, but packs more wallop than modern Charge weapons due to its very unrefined abilities. These traits are the reason it is called the Hyperblaster rather than its official name or even the other names given to it like Siegebreaker and Quakemaker. Though being replaced by more convenient Charge weapons, the weapon is still in production and will likely continue to do so, because it works, and it works well especially when you have power armored soldiers who can easily carry it.\n\nOfficial Name: Camlann Varangian V.II.
li.VanillaDesc: A charged-shot light machine gun firing unstable energy bolts. Launches a storm of projectiles ideal for suppressing groups. Powerful but heavy and slow to aim.

ThingDef.label: Service Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Service Rifle is a relic of another age, while many attribute it to the Great Domain its origin remains a mystery. A standardized military rifle mass-produced for colonial defense forces and expeditionary armies. While lacking the raw power of heavy rifles or the advanced technology of charge weapons, its reliability, ease of repair, and abundance make it a staple on the Rim. A weapon of soldiers, militias, and mercenaries who need something that simply works at a low cost to their governments.\n\nOfficial Name: Armex-Armalite Free License.

li.LoreDesc: The Service Rifle is a relic of another age, while many attribute it to the Great Domain its origin remains a mystery. A standardized military rifle mass-produced for colonial defense forces and expeditionary armies. While lacking the raw power of heavy rifles or the advanced technology of charge weapons, its reliability, ease of repair, and abundance make it a staple on the Rim. A weapon of soldiers, militias, and mercenaries who need something that simply works at a low cost to their governments.\n\nOfficial Name: Armex-Armalite Free License.
li.VanillaDesc: A reliable intermediate rifle used by militias and security forces. Balanced damage, accuracy, and rate of fire make it versatile for general duty. Common on the far Rimworlds due to its cheaper production cost compared to other materials.

ThingDef.label: flechette rifle
ThingDef.description: Based on an ancient design from humanities past, this rifle was recently designed on the world of Sisu. Sisu is a fortressworld on the very edge of the Coreworlds, it is here where the longest single war in human history has occured, the War of Sisu, which has raged for 1,371 years. The world has fought not against the mechanoids or insectoids, but against the Black King, a rogue AI which used an army of clones made for the conquest of the stars during the Great Domain Era. The Black King has ground his forces against the Sisunians for centuries with few gains. This rifle was designed to fight humans who lack armor and in this aspect it functions very well, shredding flesh with ease. The design has been exported throughout the Rimworlds, with many adopting them for defensive weapons.\n\nOfficial Name: Terys-Gua R4 "Shredder."

li.LoreDesc: Based on an ancient design from humanities past, this rifle was recently designed on the world of Sisu. Sisu is a fortressworld on the very edge of the Coreworlds, it is here where the longest single war in human history has occured, the War of Sisu, which has raged for 1,371 years. The world has fought not against the mechanoids or insectoids, but against the Black King, a rogue AI which used an army of clones made for the conquest of the stars during the Great Domain Era. The Black King has ground his forces against the Sisunians for centuries with few gains. This rifle was designed to fight humans who lack armor and in this aspect it functions very well, shredding flesh with ease. The design has been exported throughout the Rimworlds, with many adopting them for defensive weapons.\n\nOfficial Name: Terys-Gua R4 "Shredder."
li.VanillaDesc: A rare firearm which uses shredder flechettes rather than conventional bullets. Lacking the armor penetration and range of other rifles, this performs best at close range where it shreds flesh and bone with ease. It rarity is only matched by the brutality which it creates in the battlefield.

ThingDef.label: assault LMG
ThingDef.description: On the warworld of Creiddylad, the Assault LMG serves as a reminder of the sheer viciousness of the Insectoids. Creiddylad is home to the Gamma Breeder, a mutant form of the Insectoid Queens which seems to give birth to legions of insects much quicker than other hives. This has lead to the Creiddylad cities of Gwythyr and Gwyn to form the great bulwark against the Insectoids. At the front of it is the Assault LMG, one of the fastest firing weapons that humanity creates, providing a leaden deterant against insectoids. It was made after partial records of past humanity which allowed them to design a weapon which provided speed and power, though modifications created a inaccurate weapon.\n\nOfficial Name: Gywdthur M-311 Offensive Machine Gun.

li.LoreDesc: On the warworld of Creiddylad, the Assault LMG serves as a reminder of the sheer viciousness of the Insectoids. Creiddylad is home to the Gamma Breeder, a mutant form of the Insectoid Queens which seems to give birth to legions of insects much quicker than other hives. This has lead to the Creiddylad cities of Gwythyr and Gwyn to form the great bulwark against the Insectoids. At the front of it is the Assault LMG, one of the fastest firing weapons that humanity creates, providing a leaden deterant against insectoids. It was made after partial records of past humanity which allowed them to design a weapon which provided speed and power, though modifications created a inaccurate weapon.\n\nOfficial Name: Gywdthur M-311 Offensive Machine Gun.
li.VanillaDesc: A compact belt-fed squad support gun. Fires long, fast bursts for heavy suppression. Very effective at medium range but inaccurate and burns through ammunition.

ThingDef.label: phase rifle
ThingDef.description:
Designed by the Alphamech Spacer Initiative as a weapon against Mechanoids in space, it favored a non-traditional design. A bull-pup shocker rifle which fires phased electric projectiles instead of the traditional chemical ballistic. Many expedition efforts prefer this for their orbital fleets for the sheer logistics, all Alphamech shocker weapons use the Alphamech standard battery. The ease of recharging these weapons allows even the most isolated worlds can use this weapon effectively, some worlds hold phase rifles that are centuries old running off of the same battery. However, the firepower of this rifle did not meet standards when it came to anti-Mechanoid combat, however a single modification allowed this to work.

It was then equiped with an Alphamech Jupiter-25 EMP Launcher which was found to increase the anti-mechanoid combat effectiveness by 30%. Though some have modified the launcher to fill other rolls but none have arrived here, so many just blow themselves up.

Official Name: Alphamech Apollo-97 Phase Action Offensive Weapon System with Jupiter-25 EMP Launcher.

li.LoreDesc:
Designed by the Alphamech Spacer Initiative as a weapon against Mechanoids in space, it favored a non-traditional design. A bull-pup shocker rifle which fires phased electric projectiles instead of the traditional chemical ballistic. Many expedition efforts prefer this for their orbital fleets for the sheer logistics, all Alphamech shocker weapons use the Alphamech standard battery. The ease of recharging these weapons allows even the most isolated worlds can use this weapon effectively, some worlds hold phase rifles that are centuries old running off of the same battery. However, the firepower of this rifle did not meet standards when it came to anti-Mechanoid combat, however a single modification allowed this to work.

It was then equiped with an Alphamech Jupiter-25 EMP Launcher which was found to increase the anti-mechanoid combat effectiveness by 30%. Though some have modified the launcher to fill other rolls but none have arrived here, so many just blow themselves up.

Official Name: Alphamech Apollo-97 Phase Action Offensive Weapon System with Jupiter-25 EMP Launcher.
li.VanillaDesc: A unique firearm designed for firing in vacuum. Rather than a traditional bullet, the phase rifle fires a projectile of phased electricity. Effective in space and affordable allows this to see usage by all manner of spacefarers.\n\nIt is equipped with an underslung EMP launcher known as the shocker. The shocker fires compact EMP charges and must be reloaded using steel.

AbilityDef.label: underbarrel EMP launcher
AbilityDef.description: Use the underbarrel launcher attached to the phase rifle to lauch a EMP grenade.

ThingDef.label: phase carbine
ThingDef.description: As the colonization efforts overextended, many groups could not afford to purchase top of the line weaponry for their orbital stations. Even with the Mechanoid threat many groups could not keep up with the demands of corporations which seemed to have their efforts focused on datamining and virtual intelligence. Alphamech noticed this trend and rather than improving their existing designs instead choose to make the Apollo-97 with cheaper parts, labor, and maintained the price. Barely cheaper most groups sought this severally stripped version, lacking the grenade launcher and several inches of barrel length, however the battery remained the same, giving the carbine more ammunition in a fight. It stays true to Alphamech's motto, "Cannot afford Alpha Tech? Get Alphamech!"\n\nAlphamech Apollo-97 Mod. IV Phase Action Offensive Weapon System.

li.LoreDesc: As the colonization efforts overextended, many groups could not afford to purchase top of the line weaponry for their orbital stations. Even with the Mechanoid threat many groups could not keep up with the demands of corporations which seemed to have their efforts focused on datamining and virtual intelligence. Alphamech noticed this trend and rather than improving their existing designs instead choose to make the Apollo-97 with cheaper parts, labor, and maintained the price. Barely cheaper most groups sought this severally stripped version, lacking the grenade launcher and several inches of barrel length, however the battery remained the same, giving the carbine more ammunition in a fight. It stays true to Alphamech's motto, "Cannot afford Alpha Tech? Get Alphamech!"\n\nOfficial Name: Alphamech Apollo-97 Mod. IV Phase Action Offensive Weapon System.
li.VanillaDesc: A carbine version of the hase rifle, popular with colonial militias on the Rimworlds. Lighter and less accurate than the phase rifle but easier to produce and lacking of the underbarrel grenade launcher. Most colonies prefer issuing this to their local security over any sort of military.
